Title: Annotate French Clinical Data Using Large Language Model Predictions
Abstract: in clinical and other specialized domains data are scarce due to their confidential nature. this lack of data is a major problem when fine tuning language models. nevertheless very large language models  large language model  are promising for the medical domain but cannot be used directly in healthcare facilities due to data confidentiality issues. we explore an approach of annotating training data with large language model to train smaller models more adapted to our problem. we show that this method yields promising results for information extraction tasks.
